channel.title: Rsps317oldscool -Duel Arena-Fishing Trawler-Bounty Hunter-Tzhaar Fight Caves-
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/qdJosqU.png[/img]
[B]Navigation[/B]
play now : [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ujqbeulpkvm3k1u/rsps317oldscool.jar?dl=0"]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ujqbeulpkvm3k1u/rsps317oldscool.jar?dl=0[/URL]
website :: coming soon
[B]Welcome[/B] Get ready to see the best content-wise server online. rsps317oldscool offers all 22 RS2007 skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play. We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community.
[B]Stability[/B] rsps317oldscool contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind rsps317oldscool is written well by me (MrClassic). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. There have never been any duel arena cheats found. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server.. The server is very optimized, don't expect any lag at all whilst playing.
[B]Features[/B] [U]Minigames[/U] - Barbarian Assault - Duel Arena - Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar Fight Caves - Fishing Trawler - Castle Wars - Bounty Hunter
[U]Skills[/U] - All 22 Skills - Includes Hunter and Construction
[U]Misc[/U] - Very Well Written Combat System - No Lag - Safe Server - No Dupes - Flawless Content - Clue Scrolls - Weapon Poisoning - Arrows Poisoning - Music System - All Areas have Music - Whole Runescape Map Could be Used - Sailing - Gnome Gliding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BeYsKae.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
owner : [COLOR="#FF0000"]rs owner 317[/COLOR]

[B]Welcome[/B]
Get ready to see the best content-wise server online.
rsps317oldscool offers all 22 RS2007 skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play.
We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community.

[B]Stability[/B]
rsps317oldscool contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind rsps317oldscool is written well by me (MrClassic). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. There have never been any duel arena cheats found. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server… The server is very optimized, don’t expect any lag at all whilst playing.
